Author: SpaceWhale88
Text: If I ever do have a relationship I'll have to be hyper vigilant to not gain any weight bc he could always levlave me for someone thinner. O need to lose 50lbs and stay disordered in order to stay thin so he doesnt leave me but my problems would probably make him leave anyway. But so would gaining weight.

Author: GuavaSama
Text: Wow i feel you on so many levels. I lost a decent amount of weight, just so i could feel more attractive and boost my selfesteem to finally get a boyfriend.  Well said thing happend, but now im insecure af. I know he likes me, but the voice in my head still tells me im not worthy enough to even be with him. This results in me not been able to talk with him about my struggles, because i dont want to bother him.
